name: Vimcal
headline: The world's fastest calendar, beautifully designed for remote teams.

founders.name: Michael Zhao, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Vimcal. Previous PM at Microsoft and Kabam.

üéâ Vimcal just closed a $4.5M seed round![Read about it here](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2023/11/28/vimcal-raises-4-5-million-to-expand-its-team-offerings/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/659dcd1027dcc10e08a1041c_cancel.svg)
üéâ Vimcal just closed a $4.5M seed round! [Read about it here](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2023/11/28/vimcal-raises-4-5-million-to-expand-its-team-offerings/>)[ ](http://www.vimcal.com/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/65b02c7636f24e867b6c1dee_vimcal-logo-white!.png)](http://www.vimcal.com/<#>)
[NEWFor Executive Assistants](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/www.vimcal.com/ea>)[Pricing](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/vimcal.com/pricing?product=vimcal>)[Partner with us](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/www.vimcal.com/partner>)[Already have an account?](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/calendar.vimcal.com/login>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645cef00bee0f9e2b9f8ea88_vimcal-logo_white.png)
[Already have an account?](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/calendar.vimcal.com/login>)
# The calendar for
people with
 _too many_
meetings
Vimcal is the world‚Äôs fastest calendar, beautifully designed for busy people and their teams.
[Try it free](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/calendar.vimcal.com/signup>)
No credit card required
Trusted by the fastest growing companies
![2020INC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645d2891d2e12fdd0ccac825_netflix-new.png)![Ephicient logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645d28b4deb993844bf38433_Airtable-neww.png)![Arise Health logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645d28c089f63821c3128cb6_kp%20-%20neww.png)![Arise Health logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645d28ddd2e12fdd0ccb07f2_square-new.png)![Ephicient logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645d28cc5b096d72eb70fc75_nba-neww.png)![Arise Health logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645d28a6a232c66610f4a72b_uber-newww.png)
## The fastest way to share availabilities
Sharing booking links is awkward. Typing out your availabilities is tedious. Vimcal gives you the best of both worlds.
## Lightning fast everything
Vimcal has instant response times (<100 ms) and shortcuts for everything.
[Try Calendar Shortcuts](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/calendar.vimcal.com/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/661ece9a5aa6be18bd17c162_Shortcuts-vimcal.png)
## No more mental math for time zones
See overlapping work hours with anyone in any time zone.
[Try Time Travel](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/calendar.vimcal.com/signup>)
# Meet your executive assistant, disguised as a calendar. 
[Try it free](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/calendar.vimcal.com/signup>)
No credit card required
## NLP for creating meetings
You can create any event in Vimcal by using natural language.
[Try NLP Events](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/calendar.vimcal.com/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6453e747d679c95445359076_newNLP.gif)
## Lightning fast everything
You can tell Vimcal to do anything using hot keys and natural language.
## Your AI Scheduling Assistant
Let Vimcal AI get you 99% of the way there. Just confirm the options laid out for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/645a908e6fee2e3fd8eda6d1_Vimcal-mobile3.png)
## The best mobile calendar. Period.
Vimcal iOS is the most powerful mobile calendar ever designed for work and school.
## No more mental math for time zones
Pull up any time zone in the world just by typing the city.
# Even more to love
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6457c85f93a9b2a1cdda83f5_enrich_contacts.png)
# Be a better people person
Social profiles and company dossiers for everyone you meet with, so you can be on top of your game.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6459245cf062212f0afcae7c_focus-mode.png)
# Do Not Disturb Mode
Cover your calendar with a beautiful backdrop, pomodoro timer, and ambient sounds when it‚Äôs time to get into flow.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/64591e30d68d71ebac1a38fd_multi%20cal.png)
# One view to rule them all
Coordinate across all your work and personal accounts, in one unified calendar. No more flipping tabs and booking on the wrong account.
# What our users are saying
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/5f400a841890cac6f710c381_dick_costolo.jpg)
## Dick Costelo
Former CEO, Twitter
"Vimcal, call it Superhuman for calendar, new favorite productivity tool."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6164d0d0a174da5dde7c4a4b_connor.jpg)
##### Conor White-Sullivan
CEO, Roam Research
"I got onboarded onto Vimcal yesterday and can confirm it is absolutely incredible. Night and day difference from any cal app I've used, very obviously worth the price. Maybe it's "Craftsman-SaaS" Tools that take users seriously"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6164bd07875e871134aee843_alex_maccaw.jpg)
##### Alex MacCaw
Founder, Reflect & Clearbit
"I just got onboarded to Vimcal and I'm blown away. Easily the best calendar I've used. They've also solved the awkward calendly link handoff."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/5f41839b7af8765e82b49105_prukalpa.jpeg)
##### Prukalpa Sankar
CEO, ATLAN
"Been using Vimcal for a few months now and love it! This has saved me at least 20 mins a day!"
### What customers are saying...
"Been using Vimcal for a few months now and love it! This has saved me at least 20 mins a day!"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/5f41839b7af8765e82b49105_prukalpa.jpeg)
Prukalpa
CEO, ATLAN
"Vimcal, call it Superhuman for calendar, new favorite productivity tool."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/5f400a841890cac6f710c381_dick_costolo.jpg)
Dick Costolo
Former CEO, Twitter
"I just got onboarded to Vimcal and I'm blown away. Easily the best calendar I've used. They've also solved the awkward calendly link handoff."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6164bd07875e871134aee843_alex_maccaw.jpg)
Alex MacCaw
Founder, Reflect & Clearbit
"Let me put this out. Vimcal is KING ([@vimcal](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/x.com/vimcal>))I just started using since yesterday and I've already used it 2 times to schedule biz meetings and it's removed all the hassle I have with timezones, availability and custom schedules and more I'm blown away. Hat's off "
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/66c377fb5ecd593add7b239f_testy-amaanath.jpg)
Amaanath
Digital Marketing Generalist
"I'm not a [@vimcal](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/x.com/vimcal>) investor (ugh) but I am a voracious user. You should be too. So happy that I bought it for my whole team.Crazy that such a small team built such a usable tool. Excited to see them continue to make my life easier."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/66c378094ca1eb7082387050_tesy-zachware.jpg)
Zach Ware
Investor & Developer
"I'm prone to hyperbole but....One day in, [@vimcal](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/x.com/vimcal>) is the greatest product a VC could ever pay money for."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/66c378a87bfb76beefbdcd03_testy-jax.jpg)
Jax Vullinghs
VC @ Airtree
"Recently got on @vimcaland I‚Äôm now a little offended that I tolerated other calendars before"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/66c37a8098247e620d061a6e_testy-evan.jpg)
Evan Zimmerman
Building @workwithedge
"One of my favorite new products is @vimcal. Recommending it to everyone I know!"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/66c37a6d1535b5a34e5353cf_testy-nolanchurch.jpg)
Nolan Church
CEO @ Continuum
"My life is better than yours because I'm on @vimcal"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/66c37a37b4a1f10b320f4744_testy-brian.jpg)
Brian Sowards
Founder @ DrivePipelineAI
## Even more to love
# Tags and Metrics
Automatically color code your events based on keywords and see a breakdown of how you spend your time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6602e7f4e20fb8148aaeddcb_Metrics%26Tags.png)
# One view to rule them all
Coordinate across all your work and personal accounts, in one unified calendar. No more flipping tabs and booking on the wrong account.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/65f9d8a653ad3a2ad2131b85_gcal-outlook.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/64e7cd5735a0025765dd16d1_enrich-vimc.png)
# Be a better people person
See social profiles and company dossiers for everyone you meet with, so you can be on top of your game.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/64e7ce25217d5405c90bdf25_dndmode.png)
# Do Not Disturb Mode
Cover your calendar with a beautiful backdrop, pomodoro timer, and ambient sounds when it‚Äôs time to get into flow. We call it: Focus Mode.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/6633b9385b5a2f8d8ab05014_phone-site.png)
# The best mobile calendar. Period.
Schedule across time zones and send out availability, all on the go.
# Take back control of your time.
[Try it free](http://www.vimcal.com/<http:/calendar.vimcal.com/signup>)
No credit card required
# Meet your executive assistant, disguised as a calendar
[Request Access](http://www.vimcal.com/<https:/vimcal.typeform.com/aloha>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/644bf64aad86bb3b7274b4ea_vimcal_logo.png)](http://www.vimcal.com/<#>)
The world's fastest calendar, beautifully designed for people with too many meetings.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f303e34821294abdf7d62ec/66ba6b7b1032f68134bac406_certificates-vimcal.png)

generated_description:
**Vimcal: Redefining Time Management for Remote Teams**

Vimcal is a forward-thinking calendar tool founded in 2018 and based in the vibrant tech hub of New York City. With a mission to be the "world's fastest calendar," it caters beautifully to remote teams and busy professionals inundated with meetings. This innovative product emerged from Y Combinator's Batch S18, a prestigious accelerator known for launching startups that push boundaries.

With a compact team of nine dedicated employees, Vimcal focuses on blending sleek design with exceptional functionality. It recently celebrated a significant milestone: closing a $4.5 million seed round, a testament to its growing popularity and ambitious plans for expansion. 

Vimcal isn't just another scheduling tool‚Äîit's built by and for those who value their time. Its standout features include:

1. **Unparalleled Speed**: The app boasts response times under 100 milliseconds, allowing users to manage their schedules with minimal delay.
   
2. **Natural Language Processing (NLP)**: Make scheduling a breeze by creating calendar events using natural language, eliminating the cumbersome back-and-forth traditionally associated with meeting setups.

3. **Time Zone Management**: With Vimcal, users no longer need a mental map of global time zones. The application's intelligent design highlights overlapping work hours, making it seamless to coordinate meetings across different regions.

4. **AI Scheduling Assistant**: The built-in AI assistant suggests meeting times, reducing the back-and-forth typically required to find suitable slots.

5. **Mobile Optimization**: Vimcal's iOS app is lauded as one of the most powerful mobile calendars available, making it easier to access and manage schedules on the go.

The tool isn‚Äôt just for individual users‚Äîit's designed for collaborative powerhouses. Businesses like Netflix and Airtable are already leveraging Vimcal's capabilities to enhance productivity and streamline operations.

What do users think? Feedback has been overwhelmingly positive. Industry leaders hail Vimcal as a ‚Äúgame changer,‚Äù with comparisons to superhuman tools for its impressive capacity to simplify scheduling chaos.

As it continues to grow and refine its offerings, Vimcal stands out as a pivotal player in the productivity landscape. Its blend of speed, intelligence, and design is aimed squarely at those who refuse to let scheduling be a hurdle in their quest for efficiency. 

If you've been struggling with juggling schedules across platforms, it might be time to give Vimcal a try. You can explore its features with a free trial‚Äîno credit card needed. Join the multitude of users who are reclaiming their time and enhancing productivity, one meeting at a time. 

Head over to [Vimcal](http://www.vimcal.com) to learn more.
